>>> add_integer = __import__('0-add_integer').add_integer
>>> print("TESTS WITH DIFFERENT NUMBERS")
TESTS WITH DIFFERENT NUMBERS
>>> add_integer(5, 10)
15
>>> add_integer(-5, 10)
5
>>> add_integer(5.0, 8.2)
13

...
TypeError: a must be an integer
